sentences.english: To integrate government and industry resources to develop nanotechnology is important and urgently required.
sentences.chinese: 結合政府和企業資源去發展奈米科技是重要且急迫地。

sentences.english: In this work, we use the technology of DC arc-discharge to grow carbon nanotubes.
sentences.chinese: 在本論文中，以電弧放電法成長奈米碳管。

sentences.english: It also underpinns the principle for applications in nano-photonic devices.
sentences.chinese: 這些現象會是製作奈米元件的原理。

sentences.english: The amino group functionalized CdS nanoparticles have been synthesized by a one-step process.
sentences.chinese: 我們已成功合成外圍修飾胺基的硫化鎘奈米微粒。

sentences.english: Why not use photolithography to make nano structures?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼不使用光蝕刻法制造奈米結構？

sentences.english: In recent years, more and more nanostructure ZnO have been synthesized.
sentences.chinese: 近年來，愈來愈多奈米結構的氧化鋅被合成出來。

sentences.english: An Introduction to the Application of Nano_Microtechnology in Food …
sentences.chinese: 奈米科技的介紹與應用。

sentences.english: This project was devoted to the prior study on the II-VI compound semiconductor nano-optoelectronic devices.
sentences.chinese: 本計畫爲二六族化合物半導體奈米光電元件先期研究。

sentences.english: Some of the elements of our nanoscopic structure are smaller than the mean free path .
sentences.chinese: 我們的某些奈米結構元件比平均自由徑還小。

sentences.english: Bamboo type carbon nanotubes were therefore formed.
sentences.chinese: 因此而形成了竹型奈米碳管。

sentences.english: So far, the anti-depressive activity and safety of nemifitide has been verified.
sentences.chinese: 奈米非肽抗抑鬱活性和安全性已得到臨牀證實。

definition: silicon chip/also written 硅晶片[gui1 jing1 pian4]
laser (loanword used in Taiwan)/also written 鐳射|镭射
